comments.author: shasan
comments.body: Quote from: okimzti on November 09, 2022, 11:39:13 PMPictures: https://imgur.com/a/XaVrPq8It will look good if you use an image tag and also if you could post the format of the image. You can get the link of image format eg .jpg/.jpeg/.png by clicking inspect or from the view page source. If you do that then it will be like the below image and all will be able to see it with good looking.
